title: Overlook: Local multiplayer game - up to 16 players
notes: Steam lists Shared/Split Screen PvP/Co-op and 3 user reviews; SteamDB shows full controller support. Play mode inferred from description.
raw_comment: Split in 2 teams: one team is for infected robots, the other team has to find them. Up to 16 players using 8 gamepads, same screen
